description: This file defines the FinancialDatasetsTools class, a Python class that provides an interface to various financial data API endpoints, including methods for retrieving financial statements, company info, market data, SEC filings, crypto prices, and search functionalities. It initializes with feature flags to enable or disable specific tools and manages API requests with error handling.

classes.name: FinancialDatasetsTools
classes.description: A class that provides methods to interact with a financial datasets API, enabling retrieval of financial statements, company info, market data, SEC filings, crypto prices, and search functionalities.

methods.name: _make_request
methods.description: Performs an HTTP GET request to the specified API endpoint with given parameters, handling errors and API key inclusion.

methods.name: get_income_statements
methods.description: Fetches income statements for a given ticker symbol.

methods.name: get_balance_sheets
methods.description: Fetches balance sheets for a given ticker symbol.

methods.name: get_cash_flow_statements
methods.description: Fetches cash flow statements for a given ticker symbol.

methods.name: get_company_info
methods.description: Retrieves company information for a specified ticker.

methods.name: get_crypto_prices
methods.description: Retrieves cryptocurrency prices for a given symbol.

methods.name: get_earnings
methods.description: Fetches earnings data for a specified ticker.

methods.name: get_financial_metrics
methods.description: Retrieves financial metrics for a given ticker.

methods.name: get_insider_trades
methods.description: Fetches insider trades data for a ticker.

methods.name: get_institutional_ownership
methods.description: Retrieves institutional ownership data for a ticker.

methods.name: get_news
methods.description: Fetches market news, optionally filtered by ticker.

methods.name: get_stock_prices
methods.description: Retrieves stock prices for a ticker.

methods.name: search_tickers
methods.description: Searches for tickers based on a query string.

methods.name: get_sec_filings
methods.description: Fetches SEC filings for a ticker.

methods.name: get_segmented_financials
methods.description: Retrieves segmented financials for a ticker.
